data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: There was a beautiful car. It had a shiny exterior with beautiful and intricate paintwork. Its interior was luxurious. It was unknown at first whether petrol or diesel would fuel the car. It was discovered through research, rather than just to pump the car with either petrol or diesel, that the car runs on petrol.
data.original_output: There was a beautiful car. It had a shiny exterior with beautiful and intricate paintwork. Its interior was luxurious. It was unknown at first whether petrol or diesel would fuel the car. It was discovered through research, rather than just to pump the car with either petrol or diesel, that the car runs on petrol.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Stamp prices are really expensive. There was a letter that was received by someone and they were interested in how much it cost the sender to send it. They researched how much the specific stamp used cost the sender and they were shocked at the price. They remember when stamps used to be really cheap. It made them realise one of the reasons why less letters are sent by post.
data.original_output: Stamp prices are really expensive. There was a letter that was received by someone and they were interested in how much it cost the sender to send it. They researched how much the specific stamp used cost the sender and they were shocked at the price. They remember when stamps used to be really cheap. It made them realise one of the reasons why less letters are sent by post.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: In an empire someone heard music. They followed the sound and it lead them to someone else playing music on an organ instrument. The person playing the organ was having lessons from a music teacher and did comply with what they were told to play on the instrument. The music was beautiful. The musician was very talented.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: The weather was dull and gave a sense of gloom. Someone was buying products in a shop, gave their payment for the products to a cashier then left the shop. As they were walking outside it started to rain. Raindrops appeared to exist
